asset.author: HamiltonBeachBrands
asset.hookText:
• 4 smart, safety-related features:
- SureGuard™ shock-resistant concealed heating elements
- Automatic shutoff if toast gets jammed
- Cool-touch exterior
- Toast boost lifts slices higher
• Bagel, cancel, defrost buttons
• Easy-clean crumb tray
• Shade selector

transcripts: Hi I'm Kara and this is the Hamilton beach smart toast extra wide slot toaster. What makes this toaster special is the unique sure guard concealed heating element that significantly reduces the risk of shock. The toaster also has several other safety related features such as toast juice for easier toast removal cool touch sides and an advanced auto shut off feature in case toast gets jammed. Besides the many safety features the smart extra wide slot which are perfect for bagels or thick sliced bread. The bagel function toast the cut side only while more mean the round side so you have perfectly toasted bagels. Every time the defrost setting toast frozen food in one step eliminating the need to thaw your bread prior to toasting the cancel button lets you cancel the toast cycle at any time give you flexibility and control. A smart toaster that toasts the cut side and warms the round side. Now that's good thinking.
